description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YW4FdWgzTwRFneFF]{Monastic Weaponry}

Requirements You are wielding a sword that has the monk
trait in one hand.

You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

While in this stance, the only @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Step} as a free action as your next action.
